channel.title: You can't report players anymore
channel.description:
#### What happened? It's not possible to report a player for at least several days. Button "Submit" doesn't work.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
#### Steps to reproduce: After game ends in final menu click "Report Player" and then try to press "Submit" button.
#### Comments:

item.title: You can't report players anymore
item.dc:creator: Fenryll
item.description:
As Ashe says, you need to write a sentence on why you report him.

Read full topic

item.title: You can't report players anymore
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
At a guess, your report descriptions might be too short. The game won’t let you submit a report unless the description is (if I remember correctly) 15 characters or longer.

Read full topic

item.title: You can't report players anymore
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

It’s not possible to report a player for at least several days. Button “Submit” doesn’t work.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Steps to reproduce:

After game ends in final menu click “Report Player” and then try to press “Submit” button.

Comments:

Read full topic
